definition: to slip away/to escape in stealth/to skate

sentences.english: The footsteps of fortune are slippery.
sentences.chinese: 幸运的脚步是滑溜溜的。

sentences.english: People have personalities and so do things. Rubberbands are stretchy and soap is slippery.
sentences.chinese: 例如橡皮圈是有弹性的，肥皂是很滑溜的。

sentences.english: Not suitable for use in synchro mesh gearboxes due to the extreme slipperiness.
sentences.chinese: 在不适合使用同步器变速箱，由于极端滑溜。
只是灰色滑溜的小卵石。
你看他跳华尔兹，滑溜溜的，像绸缎一样。

sentences.english: The wind and rain redoubled, the roof was slippery .
sentences.chinese: 雨和风来得更猛，屋顶是滑溜溜的。

sentences.english: Jellied eels and Dornish reds filled their afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 滑溜溜的鳗鱼和多恩红酒消磨了午后时光。

sentences.english: The floor under them was black with grease and cigarette ends.
sentences.chinese: 脚下的地板乌光光的油腻滑溜，烟蒂满地。

sentences.english: At the sight of the slippery snake, he felt green around the gills.
sentences.chinese: 他一看到那条滑溜溜的蛇，就感到十分不舒服。

sentences.english: A slipperiness additive to modify the performance of friction LSDs and aid differential break-in.
sentences.chinese: 阿滑溜添加剂修改摩擦溶和援助差分性能打破项。

sentences.english: A slithery snake is wrapping itself around a tree.
sentences.chinese: 蛇滑溜的身子紧紧缠绕在树上。

sentences.english: My grandmother was tremendously old and wrinkled, with a massive wide body which was smothered in grey lace.
sentences.chinese: 年迈加皱斑斑的奶奶，庞大的身躯穿这滑溜的薄衣。

sentences.english: They were inching their way along the slippery ridge.
sentences.chinese: 他们沿着滑溜溜的山脊慢慢前进。

definition: to slip away/to escape in stealth/to skate
